name: bj-cbvexivw
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wi(wex(s0, wex(s1, w1)), wex(s1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wi(wex(s0, wex(s1, w1)), wex(s1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, wex(s1, w1)), wex(s1, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, wex(s1, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wex(s1, w1))

|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wex(s1, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

body.origin:
|- diffsw(s0, wex(s1, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Change bound variable. This is to ~ cbvexvw what ~ cbvalivw is to ~ cbvalvw . [TODO: move after ~ cbvalivw ]. (Contributed by BJ, 17-Mar-2020.)
